# limel-collapsible-section



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                   | Type      |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- |
| `isOpen` | `is-open` | `true` if the section is expanded, `false` if collapsed. Defaults to `false`. | `boolean` |


## Events

| Event   | Detail | Description                           |
| ------- | ------ | ------------------------------------- |
| `close` |        | Emitted when the section is collapsed |
| `open`  |        | Emitted when the section is expanded  |
